## Import.ImportContext.(constructor)

Protected [import context](./ts-res.import.importcontext.md) for derived classes. Public consumers use [create](./ts-res.import.importcontext.create.md) to create new instances.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected constructor(baseId?: string, conditions?: IConditionDecl[]);
```
